website_summaries.verdict: This eye-catching floral and butterfly design has both modern and traditional elements, so it's very versatile.
pros: Decals adhere to many smooth surfaces, including glass and tile
Elements arrive on 2 sheets of adhesive paper
Can be repositioned without damage to surface
Floral and butterfly theme appropriate for both adults and children
cons: Some elements can be cut off, not usable
Size of butterflies and dandelions not proportional

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good quality sticker and it doesn't fall off the wall easily. The Amazon photos made it look a lot bigger than it's actual size - see photo for comparison next to my 60lbs dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lisi

customer_reviews.title: Good decal but picture makes it look bigger
customer_reviews.text: Love this decal just wish it was a little bigger. The sizes they provided seem to be accurate but the picture they provided makes it look bigger. The picture I provided with the computer desk in it shows you a more accurate scale of size. The desk in this picture is 30in tall.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Look I'm an artist!
customer_reviews.text: I was intimidated when I took this out of the box thinking I'll never be able to do this myself. You have to assemble the main flowers yourself as they are in several pieces but if I can do it ANYONE can. It makes the blank spot in the corner much better looking
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These are not my first wall art stickers, but these ones are garbage. One of the sections would not stop rolling up and sticking to itself until it was ruined, and even pieces that went straight on the wall, like a butterfly are peeling off in less than a day. The design is exactly what I wanted, the product itself is just bad.
customer_reviews.author: F. Cera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our hippie cabin!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so these were not difficult to put up, but did require a smidge of patience, though I did have a 10 year old "helper." Could use a little more "grass" but otherwise I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Skishy Pea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these wall decals and I just ordered it again. They are a little tricky to put on but if you have patience it will turn out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: The decals look very beautiful. The larger two dandelion with the stems were a little tricky to handle but with a little patience it can be accomplished. It got stuck to a different section of the wall a couple times but was easy to remove and place where I wanted it to go. The white decals on the white sheet were a little difficult to see. The larger decals I peeled off the sheet as was. The smaller ones I cut out the outlines so it was easier for me to handle and peel out off. Overall effect is nice and we got plenty of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Lovely & artistic
customer_reviews.text: Really like the simplicity of the dandelions & butterflies. I needed it for a tall, narrow glass door separating living area from bedrooms. I only used 2 of the 3 dandelions because my glass was so narrow. When it arrived I unrolled it to lay flat for couple days. Started at the bottom (plant portion) of the largest flower. After awhile I started to cut each piece for more control in applying to the glass, using a credit card to smooth out any air bubbles. Can’t really unstick & reposition so be careful & sure where you want it. Love the finished product, free form is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Facogirl

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white decal for a gray wall. These decals (at least the white ones) have a clear border around them and aren't cut right to the edge of the image. You could see the clear edge still once they were applied to the wall. Plus the reflected the sunlight making them look like blurry spots on the wall. So disappointed. They also pulled the paint off in a couple spots when I removed them only after 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the headache ,but very pretty .
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty,but will not stay on Wallis ask for a refund but how do you return these things, lol ..I’ve had them up for a day or 2 now and everyday that Ive returned home from work I find that one has fallen off or nearly off. I’m going to remove them and get something else. Not worth the headache of replacing them or constantly placing them back on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff S.

customer_reviews.title: This is not decals, they are stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Product is not as big as I thought. These are NOT decals, they are stickers. I prefer decals which is what I put in search bar but I did think this was cute so I bought it. Some pieces were big with little thin parts which made it rip easy but it’s so close to the floor I doubt anyone will notice. It’s nice just wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.author: Mz Fe1sty

customer_reviews.title: Huge impact for low investment.
customer_reviews.text: These decals brought to life my three hallway mirrors. Very easy to install, hardest part was trying to balance how I was going to display them over three mirrors. Ended up with the left mirror having just flowers and next two showing the birds in flight over the flowers. Easy to put on mirror. I placed lightly and when I was happy with the placement used a credit card to secure. For less than $13 I transformed my entry...plus I had fun doing it. I may become an decal addict.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't adhere well
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but it keeps coming away from the wall. I just applied it last night along with another vinyl set. I have to keep pressing it back onto the wall while the other set is holding on nicely. I'm not sure how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: mbsand

customer_reviews.title: Such fun to use
customer_reviews.text: One wall in my bathroom needs decorating but anything hanging is likely to get bumped with a towel. These are perfect for making the wall interesting. Once in a while I move a butterfly just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Custer

customer_reviews.title: Not stay as advertised
customer_reviews.text: You need a very smooth area I guess to stick it to the wall. Half of it came out from wall next morning:(
customer_reviews.author: henry peter

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern. Sticks on fine. Don’t the the gloss finish or clear border around - it reflects in lamp light and sunlight. The large flower also arrives with its head in 2 pieces that don’t match up 100% no matter what you do. Really wish it was just one piece like the smaller 2. After I got over it I learned to ignore it and I like it well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as shown!
customer_reviews.text: This decal is half or a third of the size shown. It is more child like than adult. I feel that the seller has totally misrepresented their product. In the past I have purchased many decals on Amazon and never been disappointed-until now. Product is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of “clear” sticker space
customer_reviews.text: These stuck well to the wall. The problem was that design - the manufacturer did not cut out the negative space on the images and therefore there were a bunch of “clear” sticker areas and it just didn’t look very nice at all. I had stickers from another brand and they removed the negative space, and they looked super nice - so when putting the two next to each other, you could really see the poor craftsmanship of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Another Alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put up and easy to remove. I just put them up yesterday so not sure about how long they will stay up (seeing other comments about they don't last long). My only issue is they poor image quality of the dandelions. They look fine from a far but up close you can definitely tell.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C.

customer_reviews.title: Not sticking to the walls
customer_reviews.text: Was so exited to put these on and now so disappointed.. not sticking to the wall at all. Pealing off. Trying to figure out what to use to make them stick because we like the look.:( Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ITL

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but poor adhesion
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this wall decal, but it just doesn't stay up. My wall is slightly textured, but other decals I've used have stayed on the wall. This one doesn't. If your wall isn't completely smooth, I'd choose a different decal.
customer_reviews.author: Possum of the Grotto

customer_reviews.title: Look at the dimensions before buying!
customer_reviews.text: I put this up in my office and I get lots of compliments. Make sure you look at demensions because the picture is deceiving. I am 5'7" and the tallest flowers are maybe thigh high, lol! I put it on a wall with orange peel texture and it is sticking well!
customer_reviews.author: PsychE19

customer_reviews.title: Nice prints ~ adhesion a problem
customer_reviews.text: Liked the design, perfect for the black and white decor I was aiming for. The packaging came with one of the dandelions stem broken but I still tried to put it together. Application was easy but within minutes they started peeling off. I’ve used another brand before and no peeling issues for years. It’s been 2 days and I’ve been coming back to the room and kept pushing it to adhere more. A little disappointed but you get what you pay for. These pictures are taken minutes after I applied more pressure onto the decals.
customer_reviews.author: remay

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, affordable, hard to handle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the package came with some extra stickers that my kids had a blast with, but it’s nearly impossible to see what pieces are where. You have to look very hard because you receive a giant sheet of white.
customer_reviews.author: Swarthout Family

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I used these peel and sticks in my RV camper. LOVE THEM! Brightened up the room, and dont have to worry about anything falling off the wall while we are moving. Easy to apply, easy to remove and reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Beyrer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We have a modern grey wall paint in our bathroom. These white stickers look fabulous! Our bathroom looks classy not cheap and these wall stickers made it that much prettier. Everything dandelions!
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make a mural on my daughter's bedroom. It was easy to install and looks very cute. The only downside is that it reflects the light from the window and looks very much like plastic stickers.
customer_reviews.author: VIRNA VILLAGOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I love this sticker it was easy to use and perfect for the wall leading upstairs that I couldn’t figure out what to do with. I also bought a different style for my bathroom it added the perfect touch.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: No stick wall decals
customer_reviews.text: Well.....they don’t stick. Bummer. They were all rolled up. Insanely hard to peel off and keep from sticking together. And within seconds fell off the wall. Zero stick. So if you love the way these look and have to have them I’d recommend buying spray adhesive. We ended up with permanent spray adhesive...may not be how you want to go about it but it works for us and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: cdcooper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is so horrific I couldn’t even keep them in the house. I put it in the garage to air out but it still has such an awful smell. Hopefully another week in the garage will help. The flowers are easy to move around until you are happy with the look. You just need a nose plug.
customer_reviews.author: Alder T or L

customer_reviews.title: White is transparent on wall. Doesn't show up.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white and is so transparent on the wall. Could not see design very well. Very hard to put up as kept rolling. I have ordered numerous wall decals & would not recommend this one in white.
customer_reviews.author: slm

customer_reviews.title: Not adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions (cleaned the wall, dried it, etc) but it’s been on my wall for 24 hours and is all peeling off and falling off already. It started peeling before I was even done putting it on my wall. I tried to smooth it down over and over. But nope, will have to take it off completely since it will not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Orla

customer_reviews.title: Will make any wall look Geat!
customer_reviews.text: I had a little bit of a struggle getting the stems to align. Just take your time and have patience and you will have no problems. When I completed, it looks really good. I added another decal with the dandelions, and my entry way looks Great! Definitely worth every penny. Recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: jodi marie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I am a child therapist and needed something fun to spruce up my ugly office! These were very easy to place and re-place if necessary. Was hoping they’d be a little bigger but overall fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect good results on walls with satin or gloss
customer_reviews.text: Stickers are thin and horrible adhesive! Within the first day most were coming off. They might work good on flat paint but noting with satin or gloss. Also, they came with no instructions and difficult to put on bigger pieces as they are so thin and Sri k to each other. I’m bummed that I need to return them as the design is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen from East Aurora, NY

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super easy to put up. The little pieces are all separate but that way you can be creative and make it your own! Fast delivery also.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and look great!
customer_reviews.text: These were the easiest wall decals I’ve ever used! And I was able to remove and adjust with no problem. Now I’m curious if they’ll stand the test of time! I’ll update my review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: FLCat

customer_reviews.title: Added some fun but in a very classy way.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to cover up an old unused call box in my dining room and this was the perfect decal. Large enough to completely cover the box and several flowers to carry the look to 3 different walls. These were in my colors and nicely detailed so added some fun but in a very classy way.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Marie Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Wall decals
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to apply wall decals. My daughter put these on the wall in her dorm room. They make the room look so nice.
customer_reviews.author: IH

customer_reviews.title: Prettier On Line
customer_reviews.text: These decals looked a lot prettier on line. They had a horrible odor and the part that outlined the flower was clouded, so you could see it on the wall. It looked like a white flower that had a cloudy edge. Took away from the whole look. I'm sorry, but I tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Make your wish come true
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I used it to decorate my cubby at work. I used some of the dandelions for my name. The big dandelion was a little tricky because of the static, but it wasn’t too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Vergara

customer_reviews.title: Color is false advertising
customer_reviews.text: Horrible false advertising! The picture the company shows, as well as a picture that acustomer put in the reviews, shows these as being light blue. The product that I received is a dark greenish blue and does not match my daughter's room at all! I will have to send this back and probably have to pay for shipping. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it less than a month ago. It has already pealing from the wall. It is somewhat transparent and it doesn’t stand out as I hope. I thought it would be more white. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I could have gotten the same product at the dollar store. they don’t stick on as well as I expected. I even tried using a blow dryer to help the adhesive but I constantly have to press down on the decals when they begin to fall. I ordered decals from ETSY and those worked MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: Thalia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Liked them
customer_reviews.text: These were a good value for the money. Some of them would not stick to the wall, so I scotched taped them with very tiny pieces.. I am not a perfectionist. If you are, don't buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Order 2
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very happy with it. I ordered 1 they sent me 2 sets and i used them all. Love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: MindHold

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These dandelions transformed my living space. It was easy to install and worth the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Nodine

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but low on adhesion.
customer_reviews.text: The stickers do not stick even on flat wall paint surface. I have to use double sided tape to fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Faith R.

customer_reviews.title: Adhésion
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get this decor, it was really easy to apply it, but the adhesion is not working well, I see a lot of pieces just coming off. And I have to go over again and again:(((
customer_reviews.author: powergoale

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like the stencils, 1 set was perfect. I ordered 2 sets of blue. 1 of the sets the color is off. The flowers look faded and the stem is grey.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M James

customer_reviews.title: Looooove
customer_reviews.text: So I'm in love with these. Price wasn't bad and it helped dress up my w/d.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel lindsey

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looks great, but I have to keep reattaching some of the edges that pull away from the wall. Tiny nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma7180

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Really gorgeous. We used a hair dryer once all put up to really stick it on. Still going strong in living room months later! Everyone thinks we painted it
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Happy I got this.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this decal on my wall for a while now and have not had any issues with it peeling off. It was not hard at all to put on my wall. I am so happy with this product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: *ADV*

customer_reviews.title: You will need a "backup" plan
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how many stickers that I got. I had fun putting them up But I was disappointed because some of the adhesives didn't last for even one hour. Now what do I do? I am open for suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely! A little tricky to replicate the picture because stickers were in random order on the sheet but I did my best and I am very happy with the result!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McGinley

customer_reviews.title: We love Dandelions
customer_reviews.text: These arrived very promptly. We were so excited we assembled them right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: The product would not stay stuck to the wall and was falling off within minutes of sticking it on the wall
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not bad....
customer_reviews.text: Bought black and also the white.... The black was easier to install than the white
customer_reviews.author: Kandy G

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I put it above the dog bed to add some color and whimsy to the space.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Decals are pealing off wall which is a shame because it took forever to get them aligned. Once they were up the wall looked awesome. Only been up 2 days and they are pealing off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene LaVine

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old loves these
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to new blue paint , butterflies, and bedding
customer_reviews.author: Kristie  Opray

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall decal
customer_reviews.text: Wall decoration for my granddaughter’s bedroom. Easy to work with and in pieces that made it easy to customize.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Meiners

customer_reviews.title: Adhesion
customer_reviews.text: It would’ve been perfect if it wasn’t for the adhesion issue. It didn’t even stick for a minute after application. I spent at least 30 minutes applying it just to make it look like the pattern but it only took less than a minute after application that it started to peel off. It’s a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Love Marie

customer_reviews.title: Unique item
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and perfect height. Comes off easily when trying to decide where to place it. Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Domyhair

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but stickers are not easy to peel off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful wall sticker, but the manufacturer did not cut the stickers out accurately. Some of them are cut halfway, so it would not peel off. I had to manually cut out the pieces that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: they are OK
customer_reviews.text: I did read the reviews before purchasing- but most of the were good. But, one of the flowers was cut off so it cannot be used. They also look a bit shiny. They are inexpensive and do add a little flavor to the wall, but I will be taking them down once I find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Degrassi

customer_reviews.title: Subpar adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the design, the adhesive however in the clings is almost non-existent. Half of them fall right off the wall. Would give 5 stars for easy to remove because they come off the wall by themselves, but that will change the star average of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P.

customer_reviews.title: Decals don't stick as indicated
customer_reviews.text: I started installation on clean, smooth wall. I left for lunch and this is what I came home to!!!! Adhesion was horrible. They were easy to remove because they fell off the wall! I would NOT recommend anything from this company, Decalmile. Not sure if they can be returned once an attempt was made to hang the decals. Very unhappy. I would have given zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money , I want a refund. They won’t stick on the wall .
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: For the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this on my Guest bathroom the look is beautiful, but don't stick too well (and no texture walls).
customer_reviews.author: Leidiana Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stick
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Took the time to really do things right with cleaning my wall, having help, watching videos. Just would not stick what so ever. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, needs patience
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to stick on the wall - everything was just tangled together and you need to be very patient and careful to re-tangle them. But after finish it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the decals, they are very eye catching. Only problem is that the stickers don't stick, I am constantly flattening them down. I put them in my office and came in on a Monday morning to half of the lower have coming off. Other than that issue I like them, just wish they'd stick better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stick well!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed with the product. With in 5 minutes of putting, it came out and totally waste product!!
customer_reviews.author: CommonMan

customer_reviews.title: Blowing in the wind
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my office everyone loves them I'm sure the sales have gone up since my purchase😂
customer_reviews.author: joy rembert

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful peice. But beware it does not stick as well as it should, some spots started coming off the wall within days
customer_reviews.author: Lacey McGerr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who comes in has commented on how nice this looks
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Wall art
customer_reviews.text: Have had problems getting parts of this to stay stuck
customer_reviews.author: Toni Heckler

customer_reviews.title: Whimsicle..
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cute. Used in guest room and in my bath at my office. Positive comments.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: This wall decal was really poor quality. After day 2, it started to fall off. As soon As I got it, it fell apart. It looks beautiful but not for long.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t last longer than a few hours on the wall. Really disappointed. Unfortunately, I have to say it was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: They don't stick very well. But very pretty. Some difficulty putting them up
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Dont stick to the wall very good
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the wall. Dried it. Placing them on Took me a while to make sure I didn't have to peal it back off and move pieces. Then I woke up in the morning and they all pealed off onto the floor sticking to eachother. Tried to save them but ended up trashing it
customer_reviews.author: Kimp

customer_reviews.title: Wall decor
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I thought it would be. But it’s beautiful!!! A++
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the whimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The image makes this look like a giant wall decoration. It is not. Yet... I love it. I love the whimsy it added to my office of our nonprofit- MindfulSead.org. Our logo is a blowing dandelion!
customer_reviews.author: D. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Had to cut with scissors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, but it was difficult to figure out how to arrange them and a number of the stickers had to be cut with scissors because it wasn't cut properly. Took much longer than it should’ve because of that
customer_reviews.author: Janet Broadus

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to install. Have not tried to take them off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanUpchurch

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Very Pretty and if you take your time it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Denakat

customer_reviews.title: Covered up holes a wall mounts made in my walll
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to add apply went well with my current saying on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: sugarbritches

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wall decorations
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. Had a bit of trouble with the large pieces. Not getting them stuck together. But turned out fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Adhesion
customer_reviews.text: This photo was taken less than 12 hours after installing the decal. There’s a picture to show how it goes but the sizes do not match up. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply. Looks amazing on a plain whit wall. Like an expensive mural. Was easy to adjust as needed. Cheap, quick way to model a plain white bathroom :-)
customer_reviews.author: Toni McManus

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: I would love these beautiful dandelions if not for their unbearable smell. It has been days, and it still makes my throat scratchy. (No, I'm not having a cold or something.) Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiyuan Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I wished I read the reviews before purchasing. I washed my wall and the decals did not stick. Immediately started to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chamblin

customer_reviews.title: looks nice on wall but seems bit expensive for price
customer_reviews.text: looks nice on wall but seems bit expensive for price
customer_reviews.author: S Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, looks amazing in my farm glass door !
customer_reviews.author: Kariz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used it in my tv shower walls Like it very much
customer_reviews.author: John Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Took a little time to figure out, but once I did, I had so much fun putting it up. Really made a difference to my room
customer_reviews.author: Yuu

customer_reviews.title: Looks way better than I thought and easy...
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to dress up my plane closet doors. It looks way better than I thought it would and was super easy to put on. Love love love it and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G

Easy to apply, remove and reuse without leaving damage or residue
Ideal to decorate kids room, baby's room etc.
